Package edu.cpp.cs.cs141.finalProject

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bullet
    The Bullet Class inherits from PowerUp.
    Engine
    Game Engine, handle the logic execution of the game.
    GUI
    The GUI class for handling the graphical interface.
    Invincibility
    Inherit from PowerUp, make player invulnerable for 5 turns.
    Main
    The main method, where the program get executed.
    Map
    This is represent the game map, a 2 dimensional array of 81 Square objects.
    Ninja
    The Ninja class that represents the enemies.
    PowerUp
    Abstract class.
    Radar
    Create a Radar Class that inherits from PowerUp.
    Room
    This class represents the rooms in game.
    Save
    This class handle the save and load funtion of the game.
    Spy
    The Spy Class represents the player.
    Square
    The Square class formed the grid with 81 squares, every object class will inherit from this class.
    UI
    The UI class for handling the console interface.
